id.description: The UUID of the audit event to retrieve

$ul: **_links**: A link to this audit event object if you were to retrieve it individually.
**self**
**href**: URI of this document.
**account_id**: The NEXMO_API_KEY of the Vonage API account that the audit event is associated with.
**context**: A valid JSON object with information detailing the context of the audit event.
**created_at**: When the audit event was created.
**event_type**: The type of the audit event.
**event_type_description**: A description of the event type
**id**: UUID of the audit event
**source**: The source of the event.
**source_country**: ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 country code recorded for the event.
**source_description**: Description of the audit event source.
**source_ip**: The IP address used to make the account change.
**user_email**: Email of the user whose account the audit event is associated with.
**user_id**: The ID of the user that the audit event is associated with.
**error**: A human readable description of the error
**message**: A longer description of the error
**status**: The HTTP Status code of the error
**error**: A human readable description of the error XXX
**message**: A longer description of the error YYY
**status**: The HTTP Status code of the error
